author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: We love Daiquiris and this is basically a classic Daiquiri with a few bells and whistles.
name: Mai Tai (Trader Vic's) Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
